=== 2.0.0 ===
- Reorganized templates

=== 1.2.2 ===
- Fixed infotext prefix to remove query string and remove IDs
- Allow deletion of infotext
- Allow changing infotest's group_title
- Require more recent psu_base

=== 1.2.1 ===
- Created infotext_service.get_infotext(code, alt, **kwargs)
- Declutter infotext edit page

=== 1.1.0 ===
- Allow text to be grouped by group_title on the admin/edit page
- Allow admin to search for text while editing

=== 1.0.0 ===
- Updated requirements

=== 0.8.1 ===
- Increase allowed size of infotext code from 80 to 256

=== 0.8.0 ===
- Corrected permissions (administrator vs admin)
- Moved summernote sources to static-content server
- Tweaked WYSIWYG toolbar options


=== 0.7.1 ===
- Prevent paths with IDs from having unique infotext prefixes for each ID

=== 0.7.0 ===
- Infotext is updated when hitting save button rather than on every keypress
- Include infotext menu item in admin menu
- Require newer psu-base version
- Resolve "index" template name issue

=== 0.5.0 ===
- Brought up-to-date with psu-base development

=== 0.4.0 ===
- Initial Release
